text: Mtavari Arkhi (translation: Main Channel) is a private television company in Georgia. It was founded on August 17, 2019. Zaza Okuashvili owns 40% of the channel, 12% - Nika Gvaramia. Most of the channel's team consists of people who left Rustavi 2. It broadcasts throughout Georgia, both open air and via satellite, through cable operators and IP televisions. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2019 establishments in Asia Category:2019 establishments in Europe Category:Organizations based in Georgia (country) Category:Television
title: Mtavari Arkhi
